boat.full_description:
Dudley Dix had a design brief to create a small yacht in the style of a traditional working boat. The boat had to be a trailer sailer, with minimal draft; offering respectable sailing performance under sail.
The first 55 boats were built in South Africa before production moved to the UK in 2004. There is an active class association.
boat.name: Peggy
boat.short_description: A pocket cruiser with a generous sail plan and small cabin, ideal for   exploring shallow creeks.
